question: Which nation houses the "Livingstone-Stanley Monument"?
explanation: Livingstone-Stanley Monument is located in Burundi. It marks the meeting point of two famous explorers namely, Dr David Livingstone and Sir Henry Morton Stanley on 25-27 November 1871. This meeting lead to the use of famous greeting, "Dr Livingstone, I presume?". This monument is located in Bujumbura facing Lake Tanganyika.
